data.name: WindowAttribute
desc: These values are used to specify the decorations of a window.
IMPORTANT: These constants have to be disjunct with constants in VclWindowPeerAttribute.

items.name: SHOW
lines: specifies that the window is initially visible.

items.name: FULLSIZE
lines: specifies that the window fills the complete desktop area.
This applies only to top windows.

items.name: OPTIMUMSIZE
lines: specifies that the window is optimum size.
This applies only to top windows.

items.name: MINSIZE
lines: specifies that the window is minimum size.
This applies only to top windows.

items.name: BORDER
lines: specifies that the window has visible borders.
This applies only to top windows.

items.name: SIZEABLE
lines: specifies that the size of the window can be changed by the user.
This applies only to top windows.

items.name: MOVEABLE
lines: specifies that the window can be moved by the user.
This applies only to top windows.

items.name: CLOSEABLE
lines: specifies that the window can be closed by the user.
This applies only to top windows.

items.name: SYSTEMDEPENDENT
lines: specifies that the window should support the com.sun.star.awt.XSystemDependentWindowPeer interface.
This flag may be ignored, but in this case no system-dependent extension works.

items.name: NODECORATION
lines: specifies that the window should have no decoration.
